content.rendered:
Directed by Vignesh Shivan.

Written by Vignesh Shivan.

Cast Suriya(Iniyan). Keerthy Suresh(Madhu). Karthik(Kurinji Vendhan). Ramya Krishnan(Azhagu Meena). Nandha(Vetrivel). Senthil(Iniyan’s Assistant). Suresh Chandra Menon(Uthaman). RJ Balaji(Paranjothi). Sathyan(Muthu). Thambi Ramaiah(Iniyan’s Father (as Thambi Ramayya)). Kalaiyarasan(Iniyan’s Friend). Anandraj(Minister (as Anand Raj)). Shivashankar(Ondiveeran). Yogi Babu(Narayanan). Vinodhini Vaidynathan(Mangaiyarkarasi). Brahmanandam(Income Tax Officer).Venkatesh Harinathan. Nirosha(Minister’s Wife).Gadam Kishan. Bala Singh(Police Officer) .Abhirami.Aditya.Aishwaraya.Ajith.Arun.Bala.Balasubramanian.Brugadish.Vijay Chakravarthy.Chitra.Daniel.Dhansika.Harshavardhan.Sumita Hazarika.Hema.Divya Iyer.Jayadev.Yuva Karthika.Kishore.Kumar.Ram Kumar.Bharani Kurukkan.Lakshman.Lalitha.Lvr.Bhanu Maami.Manoj. Meera Mitun((as Meera Mithun)).Chandra Mohan.Mohanraj.Murali.Parthiban.Pooja.Prabhakaran.Praveen.Raasmogan.Rahul.Rajarajan.Rajini.K. Rajkumar.Ram.’Winner’ Ramachandran.Ramakrishnan.Ramsingh.Raveena.Ravi.Saleem.Santhosh.Seetharaman.Shantini.Maria Sharam.Shivaranjith.Shubhadini.Sudhakar. Sudhakar(Azhagu Meena’s husband).Sukanya.Timothy.Varadhan.Venkatram.Venkatraman.Dinesh Vijay.Yamini.Yusuf

Language Tamil.

Producers K.E. Gnanavelraja.

Production Aadnah Arts. Studio Green.
